channel.title: [Project] Sinequity
channel.description:
[right][b]Last Updated: 5:32 PM, February 13, 2012[/b][/right] [center][img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h335/mista_pnut/project-sinequity.png[/img][/center] [u][b]Introduction:[/b][/u] Hello, and welcome to [Project] Sinequity's development thread! I don't know about the rest of you guys, but my favorite revision of a Runescape has to be 317. So I'm starting a huge project, with not only one server, but [b]two[/b]! Now, I know your probably questioning this right now, but I'll explain how it works below!
[u][b]What is [Project] Sinequity?[/b][/u] [Project] Sinequity is actually two projects in one. The first of the two projects is a Project Insanity base that I will try to perfect combat, skilling, stability, and economy. The second part of this project will be started from a Deltascape source. I'll be heavily modifying this base by attempting to adding a higher revision mapping (474 in mind) and items. As well as those two large challenges, I plan on re-writing every skill, fixing the many bugs, and adding a bit of my own taste in this server aswell.
[u][b]Goals:[/b][/u] My personal goal for [Project] Sinequity overall is to learn as much as I can from the Project Insanity and Deltascape bases. Along with that, I'd like to create the best 317 servers that I can. I plan on using all of the knowledge I learn during this project to help anyone who is in need of assistance.
[u][b]About me:[/b][/u] I am not greatly known here on Moparscape so I figured I could do a little biography real quick. I'm 19 years old and attend collage at Purdue University. I'm studdying many of the computer languages as I attend, the big ones being C++ and HTML. I know most of you guys' aren't interested in this part so I'll cut if off. Feel free to ask me any question you may have.
[size=12pt][b]The projects![/b][/size] [hr] [size=10pt][b]Project Insanity[/b][/size]
[u][b]Information:[/b][/u] A small bit of information for this project is that I'm planning on making this an Burthorpe because not many servers are based here. I'll be trying to get as good as a combat system as I can possibly build, aswell as outstanding overall skilling, stability, and try to maintain a good economy.
[u][b]Goals[/b][/u] KEY Green = Complete Orange = In-progress Red = Not started
[u][b]Combat[/b][/u]
[ul][li]NPC vs NPC[/li] [li]Clipping[/li] [li]NPC face player if attacking each other[/li] [li]Effective NPC Combat type switching[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Minigames(Unfinished!)[/u][/b]
[ul][li]Barrows, using spade, decent reward rate[/li] [li]Basic Soul Wars, First team to kill the others Avatar wins. Teams randomized for fairness.[/li] [li]Duel Arena, dupe proof, with all interfaces working 100%[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Skilling[/b][/u] -Runecrafting
[ul][li]Pouches[/li] [li]Abyss[/li][/ul]
-Agility
[ul][li]Gnome Stronghold Course + Advanced[/li] [li]Barbarian Course + Advanced[/li] [li]Wilderness Course[/li][/ul]
-Thieving
[ul][li]All Stalls[/li] [li]Perfect Pick-Pocketing using all possible NPCs[/li][/ul]
-Herblore
[ul][li]Cleaning Herbs[/li] [li]Filling Vials with Water[/li] [li]Creating Potions (Including unfinished)[/li] [li]Combining Potions[/li] [li]Majority of Potions can be made and used[/li][/ul]
-Farming
[ul][li]Grow Trees[/li] [li]Grow Herbs[/li] [li]Have to use appropriate tools[/li] [li]Equipment held by Tool Leprechaun[/li][/ul]
-Crafting
[ul][li]Leather/Dragonhide[/li] [li]Amulets[/li] [li]Gem Cutting[/li][/ul]
-Fletching
[ul][li]All Arrows[/li] [li]All Bows + Stringing[/li][/ul]
-Fishing
[ul][li]All Fish[/li] [li]Majority of Locations[/li] [li]Moving Fishing Spots[/li][/ul]
-Cooking
[ul][li]All Fish[/li] [li]Majority of food[/li][/ul]
-Woodcutting
[ul][li]All Trees[/li] [li]All Hatchets[/li] [li]Trees are actually cut down and have timer until respawn[/li][/ul]
-Firemaking
[ul][li]All Logs[/li] [li]Auto-step North +1[/li] [li]Clipping[/li][/ul]
-Smithing
[ul][li]Smelt all bars[/li] [li]Smith all Armour and Weapons[/li][/ul]
-Mining
[ul][li]All Ores[/li] [li]All Pickaxes[/li] [li]Majority of locations[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Miscellaneous[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Correct NPC Locations[/li] [li]Correct NPC Drops[/li] [li]Bank All[/li] [li]Picking Flax[/li] [li]Clean out all Shops and add different items[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Update log:[/b][/u] [code] 2/11/12: Worked with Runecrafting a bit 2/11/12: Completed All Cooking goals, for now 2/11/12: Can fish all types of fish now 2/13/12: NPCs now face whoever it is attacking 2/13/12: Finished barrows, checked reward rate and it was fabulous after 6-7 modifications 2/13/12: Runecrafting Abyss is working to the fullest now 2/13/12: Added a lot of potions to be able to be created using the correct requirements 2/13/12: Can craft and tan leather/dragonhide 2/13/12: Gem cutting works perfectly to my liking 2/13/12: You can now smelt all bars bronze-rune [/code] [hr] [size=10pt][b]Delta[/b][/size]
[u][b]Information:[/b][/u] For the Delta server, I'm planning on adding a great combat base. This is the piece that I will be trying to add on to the most. I already have a great start on the server itself. But, the special part about this server is that I will be adding my own touches. Not just any other Delta, but a Delta modified to maximize playing time without losing interest in the server. This is not an easy task however.
[u][b]Goals[/b][/u] KEY Green = Complete Orange = In-progress Red = Not started
[u][b]Combat[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Clipping[/li] [li]Dragon Claws with 4 hit spec[/li] [li]NPC face player if attacking each other[/li][/ul]
[u][b]NPCs[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Add Corporal Beast with correct animations[/li] [li]Add full godwars with correct animations and locations[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Skilling[/b][/u] -Runecrafting
[ul][li]Basic Runecrafting system[/li] [li]Abyss[/li][/ul]
-Agility
[ul][li]Main Agility Courses such as Gnome Stronghold and Barbarian Course[/li] [li]Custom Agility area within the main areas of the server(too make agility more fun!)[/li][/ul]
-Thieving
[ul][li]Pick-Pocketing with correct timer[/li] [li]Stalls that give items that you can turn into money[/li][/ul]
-Herblore
[ul][li]Cleaning Herbs[/li] [li]Filling Vials with Water[/li] [li]Creating Potions (Including unfinished)[/li] [li]Combining Potions[/li] [li]Majority of Potions can be made and used[/li][/ul]
-Farming
[ul][li]Grow Trees[/li] [li]Grow Herbs[/li] [li]Grow food such as Easter Eggs and Pumpkins[/li] [li]Have to use appropriate tools[/li] [li]Equipment held by Tool Leprechaun[/li][/ul]
-Crafting
[ul][li]Leather/Dragonhide[/li] [li]Amulets[/li] [li]Gem Cutting[/li] [li]Spinning Flax and Wool[/li][/ul]
-Fletching
[ul][li]All Arrows[/li] [li]All Bows + Stringing[/li][/ul]
-Fishing
[ul][li]All Fish[/li] [li]Majority of Locations[/li] [li]Moving Fishing Spots[/li][/ul]
-Cooking
[ul][li]All Fish[/li] [li]Majority of food[/li][/ul]
-Woodcutting
[ul][li]All Trees[/li] [li]All Hatchets[/li] [li]Ivy[/li] [li]Inferno Adze[/li] [li]Bird Nests[/li] [li]Trees are actually cut down and have timer until respawn[/li][/ul]
-Firemaking
[ul][li]All Logs[/li] [li]Auto-step North +1[/li] [li]Clipping[/li][/ul]
-Smithing
[ul][li]Smelt all bars[/li] [li]Smith all Armour and Weapons[/li][/ul]
-Mining
[ul][li]All Ores[/li] [li]All Pickaxes[/li] [li]Majority of locations[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Miscellaneous[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Correct NPC Locations[/li] [li]Correct NPC Drops[/li] [li]Bank All[/li] [li]Clean out all Shops and add different items[/li] [li]Add 474 mapping and 474 items[/li] [li]Add Chaotics and Primal Armour*[/li] [li]Decent Party Room for huge moments in [Project] Sinequity's history[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Update log:[/b][/u] [code] 2/11/12: Worked on client a lot, added new side icons and chatbox 2/11/12: Added a few new interfaces for future use 2/11/12: Added a welcome screen upon login 2/11/12: Added Dragon Claws, all PK armour, Dragon Platebody, Armadyl, and Dagon Hai' Gear 2/11/12: Added all of the new items to the config file, and added correct stats with the gear. 2/12/12: Added Picking Flax 2/12/12: Added Tanning Hides interface 2/12/12: Adding Crafting Shop 2/12/12: Spinning Wheel spins flax to bow-string and wool to ball of wool 2/12/12: Added correct requirements for all ways of crafting 2/12/12: Added tanning leather and dragonhides 2/12/12: Added gem-cutting 2/12/12: Added making dragonhide and leather armour 2/12/12: Added 4 hit Dragon Claw Special, only the first one hits, other 3 are always 0s. 2/12/12: Added the main trees for woodcutting 2/12/12: Added Bronze through Dragon hatchet, still want to add Inferno Adze 2/13/12: Added Forum link to the top of the client 2/14/12: Added Stringing Shortbows and Longbows 2/14/12: Edited starter kit 2/15/12: Cleaned class8.java [/code]
[b][u]Tutorials:[/u][/b] [code=Crafting] Setup: Type-- Quick directions-- Item - Required Level
Cutting Gemstones-- Chisel on Uncut-- Sapphire - 20 Emeralrd - 27 Ruby - 34 Diamond - 43 Dragonstone - 55
Hides-- Tan the leather, use needle on leather, have appropriate amount of thread in your inventory-- Leather Armour - 14 Leather Chaps - 14 Leather Boots - 14 Leather Gloves - 14 Leather Vambraces - 14 Leather Cowl - 14 Leather Coif - 14 Green Body - 63 Green Chaps - 60 Green Vambraces - 57 Blue Body - 71 Blue Chaps - 68 Blue Vambraces - 66 Red Body - 77 Red Chaps - 75 Red Vambraces - 73 Black Body - 82 Black Chaps - 82 Black Vambraces - 79
Stringing-- Have appropriate item in your inventory and use the spinning wheel-- Flax to Bow-string - 1 Wool to Ball of wool - 1 Any unstrung amulet on a ball of wool - 1 [/code]
Pictures will be added soon.
Thank-you to RiiPiiNFtW for the awesome banner!!

Very true, I’m personally a Delta fan but PI is just a better base. I know it’s a lot of work, but until I find that it’s overloading, I won’t drop one.

This statement. It hurts.
[/quote][/quote]
The truth hurts

item.title: [Project] Sinequity
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

[right]Last Updated: 5:32 PM, February 13, 2012[/right]
[center][/center]
Introduction:
Hello, and welcome to [Project] Sinequity’s development thread! I don’t know about the rest of you guys, but my favorite revision of a Runescape has to be 317. So I’m starting a huge project, with not only one server, but two! Now, I know your probably questioning this right now, but I’ll explain how it works below!

What is [Project] Sinequity?
[Project] Sinequity is actually two projects in one. The first of the two projects is a Project Insanity base that I will try to perfect combat, skilling, stability, and economy. The second part of this project will be started from a Deltascape source. I’ll be heavily modifying this base by attempting to adding a higher revision mapping (474 in mind) and items. As well as those two large challenges, I plan on re-writing every skill, fixing the many bugs, and adding a bit of my own taste in this server aswell.

Goals:
My personal goal for [Project] Sinequity overall is to learn as much as I can from the Project Insanity and Deltascape bases. Along with that, I’d like to create the best 317 servers that I can. I plan on using all of the knowledge I learn during this project to help anyone who is in need of assistance.

About me:
I am not greatly known here on Moparscape so I figured I could do a little biography real quick. I’m 19 years old and attend collage at Purdue University. I’m studdying many of the computer languages as I attend, the big ones being C++ and HTML. I know most of you guys’ aren’t interested in this part so I’ll cut if off. Feel free to ask me any question you may have.

[size=12pt]The projects![/size]
[hr]
[size=10pt]Project Insanity[/size]

Information:
A small bit of information for this project is that I’m planning on making this an Burthorpe because not many servers are based here. I’ll be trying to get as good as a combat system as I can possibly build, aswell as outstanding overall skilling, stability, and try to maintain a good economy.

Goals
KEY
Green = Complete
Orange = In-progress
Red = Not started

Combat

[ul][li]NPC vs NPC[/li]
[li]Clipping[/li]
[li]NPC face player if attacking each other[/li]
[li]Effective NPC Combat type switching[/li][/ul]

[b]Minigames(Unfinished!)[/b]

[ul][li]Barrows, using spade, decent reward rate[/li]
[li]Basic Soul Wars, First team to kill the others Avatar wins. Teams randomized for fairness.[/li]
[li]Duel Arena, dupe proof, with all interfaces working 100%[/li][/ul]

Skilling
-Runecrafting

[ul][li]Pouches[/li]
[li]Abyss[/li][/ul]

-Agility

[ul][li]Gnome Stronghold Course + Advanced[/li]
[li]Barbarian Course + Advanced[/li]
[li]Wilderness Course[/li][/ul]

-Thieving

[ul][li]All Stalls[/li]
[li]Perfect Pick-Pocketing using all possible NPCs[/li][/ul]

-Herblore

[ul][li]Cleaning Herbs[/li]
[li]Filling Vials with Water[/li]
[li]Creating Potions (Including unfinished)[/li]
[li]Combining Potions[/li]
[li]Majority of Potions can be made and used[/li][/ul]

-Farming

[ul][li]Grow Trees[/li]
[li]Grow Herbs[/li]
[li]Have to use appropriate tools[/li]
[li]Equipment held by Tool Leprechaun[/li][/ul]

-Crafting

[ul][li]Leather/Dragonhide[/li]
[li]Amulets[/li]
[li]Gem Cutting[/li][/ul]

-Fletching

[ul][li]All Arrows[/li]
[li]All Bows + Stringing[/li][/ul]

-Fishing

[ul][li]All Fish[/li]
[li]Majority of Locations[/li]
[li]Moving Fishing Spots[/li][/ul]

-Cooking

[ul][li]All Fish[/li]
[li]Majority of food[/li][/ul]

-Woodcutting

[ul][li]All Trees[/li]
[li]All Hatchets[/li]
[li]Trees are actually cut down and have timer until respawn[/li][/ul]

-Firemaking

[ul][li]All Logs[/li]
[li]Auto-step North +1[/li]
[li]Clipping[/li][/ul]

-Smithing

[ul][li]Smelt all bars[/li]
[li]Smith all Armour and Weapons[/li][/ul]

-Mining

[ul][li]All Ores[/li]
[li]All Pickaxes[/li]
[li]Majority of locations[/li][/ul]

Miscellaneous

[ul][li]Correct NPC Locations[/li]
[li]Correct NPC Drops[/li]
[li]Bank All[/li]
[li]Picking Flax[/li]
[li]Clean out all Shops and add different items[/li][/ul]

Update log:

2/11/12: Worked with Runecrafting a bit
2/11/12: Completed All Cooking goals, for now
2/11/12: Can fish all types of fish now
2/13/12: NPCs now face whoever it is attacking
2/13/12: Finished barrows, checked reward rate and it was fabulous after 6-7 modifications
2/13/12: Runecrafting Abyss is working to the fullest now
2/13/12: Added a lot of potions to be able to be created using the correct requirements
2/13/12: Can craft and tan leather/dragonhide
2/13/12: Gem cutting works perfectly to my liking
2/13/12: You can now smelt all bars bronze-rune

[hr]
[size=10pt]Delta[/size]

Information:
For the Delta server, I’m planning on adding a great combat base. This is the piece that I will be trying to add on to the most. I already have a great start on the server itself. But, the special part about this server is that I will be adding my own touches. Not just any other Delta, but a Delta modified to maximize playing time without losing interest in the server. This is not an easy task however.

Goals
KEY
Green = Complete
Orange = In-progress
Red = Not started

Combat

[ul][li]Clipping[/li]
[li]Dragon Claws with 4 hit spec[/li]
[li]NPC face player if attacking each other[/li][/ul]

NPCs

[ul][li]Add Corporal Beast with correct animations[/li]
[li]Add full godwars with correct animations and locations[/li][/ul]

Skilling
-Runecrafting

[ul][li]Basic Runecrafting system[/li]
[li]Abyss[/li][/ul]

-Agility

[ul][li]Main Agility Courses such as Gnome Stronghold and Barbarian Course[/li]
[li]Custom Agility area within the main areas of the server(too make agility more fun!)[/li][/ul]

-Thieving

[ul][li]Pick-Pocketing with correct timer[/li]
[li]Stalls that give items that you can turn into money[/li][/ul]

-Herblore

[ul][li]Cleaning Herbs[/li]
[li]Filling Vials with Water[/li]
[li]Creating Potions (Including unfinished)[/li]
[li]Combining Potions[/li]
[li]Majority of Potions can be made and used[/li][/ul]

-Farming

[ul][li]Grow Trees[/li]
[li]Grow Herbs[/li]
[li]Grow food such as Easter Eggs and Pumpkins[/li]
[li]Have to use appropriate tools[/li]
[li]Equipment held by Tool Leprechaun[/li][/ul]

-Crafting

[ul][li]Leather/Dragonhide[/li]
[li]Amulets[/li]
[li]Gem Cutting[/li]
[li]Spinning Flax and Wool[/li][/ul]

-Fletching

[ul][li]All Arrows[/li]
[li]All Bows + Stringing[/li][/ul]

-Fishing

[ul][li]All Fish[/li]
[li]Majority of Locations[/li]
[li]Moving Fishing Spots[/li][/ul]

-Cooking

[ul][li]All Fish[/li]
[li]Majority of food[/li][/ul]

-Woodcutting

[ul][li]All Trees[/li]
[li]All Hatchets[/li]
[li]Ivy[/li]
[li]Inferno Adze[/li]
[li]Bird Nests[/li]
[li]Trees are actually cut down and have timer until respawn[/li][/ul]

-Firemaking

[ul][li]All Logs[/li]
[li]Auto-step North +1[/li]
[li]Clipping[/li][/ul]

-Smithing

[ul][li]Smelt all bars[/li]
[li]Smith all Armour and Weapons[/li][/ul]

-Mining

[ul][li]All Ores[/li]
[li]All Pickaxes[/li]
[li]Majority of locations[/li][/ul]

Miscellaneous

[ul][li]Correct NPC Locations[/li]
[li]Correct NPC Drops[/li]
[li]Bank All[/li]
[li]Clean out all Shops and add different items[/li]
[li]Add 474 mapping and 474 items[/li]
[li]Add Chaotics and Primal Armour*[/li]
[li]Decent Party Room for huge moments in [Project] Sinequity’s history[/li][/ul]

Update log:

2/11/12: Worked on client a lot, added new side icons and chatbox
2/11/12: Added a few new interfaces for future use
2/11/12: Added a welcome screen upon login
2/11/12: Added Dragon Claws, all PK armour, Dragon Platebody, Armadyl, and Dagon Hai' Gear
2/11/12: Added all of the new items to the config file, and added correct stats with the gear.
2/12/12: Added Picking Flax
2/12/12: Added Tanning Hides interface
2/12/12: Adding Crafting Shop
2/12/12: Spinning Wheel spins flax to bow-string and wool to ball of wool
2/12/12: Added correct requirements for all ways of crafting
2/12/12: Added tanning leather and dragonhides
2/12/12: Added gem-cutting
2/12/12: Added making dragonhide and leather armour
2/12/12: Added 4 hit Dragon Claw Special, only the first one hits, other 3 are always 0s.
2/12/12: Added the main trees for woodcutting
2/12/12: Added Bronze through Dragon hatchet, still want to add Inferno Adze
2/13/12: Added Forum link to the top of the client
2/14/12: Added Stringing Shortbows and Longbows 
2/14/12: Edited starter kit
2/15/12: Cleaned class8.java

Tutorials:

Setup:
Type--
Quick directions--
Item - Required Level

Cutting Gemstones--
Chisel on Uncut--
Sapphire - 20
Emeralrd - 27
Ruby - 34
Diamond - 43
Dragonstone - 55

Hides--
Tan the leather, use needle on leather, have appropriate amount of thread in your inventory--
Leather Armour - 14
Leather Chaps - 14
Leather Boots - 14
Leather Gloves - 14
Leather Vambraces - 14
Leather Cowl - 14
Leather Coif - 14
Green Body - 63
Green Chaps - 60
Green Vambraces - 57
Blue Body - 71
Blue Chaps - 68
Blue Vambraces - 66
Red Body - 77
Red Chaps - 75
Red Vambraces - 73
Black Body - 82
Black Chaps - 82
Black Vambraces - 79

Stringing--
Have appropriate item in your inventory and use the spinning wheel--
Flax to Bow-string - 1
Wool to Ball of wool - 1
Any unstrung amulet on a ball of wool - 1

Pictures will be added soon.

Thank-you to RiiPiiNFtW for the awesome banner!!

Read full topic
